description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
37 Douglas Road, Islington, London, N1 2PLD

TPO Reference:
T7– London Plane of LBI TPO (NO.354) 2007
T8– Sycamore of LBI TPO (NO.354) 2007
T9– Lime of LBI TPO (NO.354) 2007
T10– Ash of LBI TPO (NO.354) 2007

PO Number:
T110342

Work specifications:

1 x London Plane (T7) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.354) 2007
General Prune:
Crown lift up to statutory heights
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood
Prune to clear buildings 
General Reduction:
Crown reduce to the last previous points of reduction

1 x Sycamore (T8) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.354) 2007
General Prune:
Crown lift up to statutory heights
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood
Prune to clear buildings 
Crown reduce to the last previous points of reduction

1 x Lime (T9) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.354) 2007
General Prune:
Crown lift up to statutory heights
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood
Prune to clear buildings 
Crown reduce to the last previous points of reduction

1 x Ash (T10) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.354) 2007
General Prune:
Crown lift up to statutory heights
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood
Prune to clear buildings 
Crown reduce to the last previous points of reduction
